column4: Any reason why I can't connect to the Internet at all with a static IP on Ubuntu, unlike Windows?
No problems for ubuntu to do that. Just make sure you set dns servers and your gateway...
IP address: 192.168.1.111, Subnet mask: 255.255.255.0, Default gateway: 192.168.1.1, DNS server: 192.168.1.1 (sorry for the delay, my computer's just being slow again)
